nodes.text: Jillian was a Human female researcher who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, Jillian and two other colleagues, Bathoz and Rengar, were kidnapped and killed by the Canopy Bandits on the planet Kashyyyk. Enraged, a surviving colleague named Lisum asked a spacer to kill the Canopy Bandits out of vengeance.

Jillian appeared as a dead non-player character in 2005 expansion pack Rage of the Wookiees for the massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.

In the video game, the name Jillian was mentioned in the quest dialogue along with the names of two other colleagues. When the player was tasked with investigating the Canopy Bandits' camp, they would discover the dead bodies of two of the three researchers, a Human man and woman. The woman was clearly implied to be Jillian.
